game.name: Total War: Shogun 2 - Blood Pack DLC
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Downloadable Content, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The Total War battle engine has been re-engineered for the ultimate in visceral conflict. Intricate new animations enable your Samurai to carve a bloody, limb-strewn path through enemy armies.
